snippet.title: Galacide Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Galacide is an evolution of the shoot ‘em up genre, combining the fast-paced action from classic shooters with the quick-thinking tactics of puzzlers. To complete a story-driven Campaign or score-based Endless Play, players must choose from a variety of ships, in order to destroy multiple enemies and collect their debris, shooting it at Match-4 style wall to clear it!

Get it now on Steam's Early Access!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/356790/

Or on the Humble Bundle Store!
https://www.humblebundle.com/store/p/galacide_storefront

Find out more at:
Official Website: http://Galaci.de
Twitter: https://twitter.com/punyhuman
